item.title: Version 0.6.0
item.description:
What's New in 0.6.0

  • Directory scanner to rediscover recordings after DB resets
  • Cloud-aware file tracking (iCloud, Dropbox, Google Drive)
  • Fix playback not switching when selecting another recording
  • File menu with New Recording, Delete, Show in Finder, Open in QuickTime
  • Share button now visible in toolbar
